org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: Atlas Energy Systems, ACEN, and Alphabet Energy operate in the energy technology sector. Atlas Energy Systems focuses on commercializing direct heat-to-energy science, while ACEN is an energy platform and Alphabet Energy commercializes waste heat recovery technology, enabling customers to generate electrical power.

overview_description.description:
Atlas Energy Systems is an energy technology company commercializing the direct heat-to-energy science of Thermionics. The technology is called a thermionic energy converter and it directly converts heat to electricity with no moving parts. The company developing solid-state energy converters for waste heat power production, concentrated solar, and advanced nuclear reactors.

Atlas Energy Systems pursuing a patent-pending direct energy conversion system that uses high-grade heat to boil electrons from a material via thermionic emission. These boiled-off electrons are collected across a small gap, then used to generate electricity. They using modern materials, new simulation software, and advanced manufacturing techniques to bring a 50-year-old technology into the 21st century.

Atlas Energy Systems was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Romeoville, Illinois, USA.

about_short_description.short_description: Atlas Energy Systems is an energy technology company commercializing the direct heat-to-energy science of Thermionics.

product.name: Thermionic Devices
product.description: Converts heat directly into electricity using a process that involves boiling electrons from an emitter and transferring them to a collector through a vacuum or plasma gap.

product.name: Applications in Decarbonization
product.description: Utilizes waste heat sources such as oil & gas flare stacks, combustion and incineration systems, concentrated solar, nuclear power, metals, chemical manufacturing, and rocket propulsion for energy conversion.
